hadiths.text: It was narrated from Husain bin ‘Ali that his mother, Fatimah the daughter of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘A man has no one to blame but himself, if he goes to bed with a smell emanating from his hand.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ بَاتَ وَفِي يَدِهِ رِيحُ غَمَرٍ
chapter.eng-name: One who goes to bed with smell emanating from his hand
